originalText.text: It was my first time shopping at these place .I like it, very well organized and since I always lose my way the staff was very helpful. Definitely I'm going back again

text.text: It was my first time shopping at these place .I like it, very well organized and since I always lose my way the staff was very helpful. Definitely I'm going back again

originalText.text: My visit went well,  just to pick up some things bowls of, The Big Arizona juices and beans . The customer service was very good and timely and had what I needed and more

text.text: My visit went well,  just to pick up some things bowls of, The Big Arizona juices and beans . The customer service was very good and timely and had what I needed and more

originalText.text: This supermarket is what a neighborhood like this needs.  There is another close by that offers a different twist ...bakery, pizza, coffee and a few high end items. The one thing that makes this 4 star is how cold this place is burrrr. I prefer going during the week . They say that you should never buy flowers in a supermarket and always shop the perimeter of a supermarket for the healthiest foods. Fruits and vegetables get a 8 from me here they are pretty fresh. Meat section is crazy pork, beef, chicken and a corner meat section that will cut your whole chicken if you like. Prices are reasonable sales are abundant. Who runs this market I am not sure but they are doing a good job so far. The aisle get a 6 out of 10 as they are narrow and some displays are just in the way. They have many check outs.

originalText.text: It's no Pathmark. That's an unfair comparison, but it is the same distance from me as Pathmark was, so the comparison naturally comes to mind. Not much else to say. I know that isn't quite a review of Shop Fair, but I just walked the quarter-mile to Pathmark without any particular goal, ignoring the supermarket across the street from me. I don't feel that urge with Shop Fair, though it is superior to the one across the street from me. And that's the long and short of my subjective and knowingly oblique review.

originalText.text: I use to go to this supermarket because the prices weren’t to bad but the customer service is not good there. Yesterday I endured something no customer should never have to deal with regardless of the location the supermarket is at. One of the cashiers kept talking to her co worker while I waited to be attended to. I asked several times if she was open and she continued to ignore me. When she saw I left the groceries there and was walking out then she approaches me oh I’m open what the F you think. This type of behavior is unacceptable and unprofessional. Nobody should have to endure this kind of behavior. I called and made a complaint which I doubt if it will go somewhere because they don’t seem to care about customers. I decided I wouldn’t spend my money there anymore. I rather go to a supermarket where there is professionalism and customer service.
